unit.enum: public enum ApplicationState { STATUS, LOAD, SCHEMA, DC, RACK, RELEASE_VERSION, REMOVAL_COORDINATOR, INTERNAL_IP, RPC_ADDRESS, // pad to allow adding new states to existing cluster X1, X2, X3, X4, X5, }
